# Dirac Delta

-$$P(X \in A) = \begin{cases}1& \text{if 0}\in A\\[2ex] 0& \text{if } 0 \notin A \end{cases}$$

- $$P(X \in A) = \int_{A}\delta(x)dx$$

## In $\mathbb{R}^{n}$
- it is a [PDF](PDF.qmd) which describes prob concentrated in the origin
- Multi [Point Distribution](Point%20Distribution.qmd) -> combine dirac deltas
